00032 #ifndef __LWIP_IP_H__
00033 #define __LWIP_IP_H__
00034 
00035 #include "lwip/arch.h"
00036 
00037 #include "lwip/def.h"
00038 #include "lwip/pbuf.h"
00039 #include "lwip/ip_addr.h"
00040 
00041 #include "lwip/err.h"
00042 
00043 struct netif;
00044 
00045 void ip_init(void);
00046 u8_t ip_lookup(void *header, struct netif *inp);
00047 struct netif *ip_route(struct ip_addr *dest);
00048 err_t ip_input(struct pbuf *p, struct netif *inp);
00049 err_t ip_output(struct pbuf *p, struct ip_addr *src, struct ip_addr *dest,
00050     u8_t ttl, u8_t proto);
00051 err_t ip_output_if(struct pbuf *p, struct ip_addr *src, struct ip_addr *dest,
00052        u8_t ttl, u8_t proto,
00053        struct netif *netif);
00054 
00055 #define IP_HLEN 20
00056 
00057 #define IP_PROTO_ICMP 1
00058 #define IP_PROTO_UDP 17
00059 #define IP_PROTO_UDPLITE 170
00060 #define IP_PROTO_TCP 6
00061 
00062 /* This is passed as the destination address to ip_output_if (not
00063    to ip_output), meaning that an IP header already is constructed
00064    in the pbuf. This is used when TCP retransmits. */
00065 #ifdef IP_HDRINCL
00066 #undef IP_HDRINCL
00067 #endif /* IP_HDRINCL */
00068 #define IP_HDRINCL  NULL
00069 
00070 #ifdef PACK_STRUCT_USE_INCLUDES
00071 #  include "arch/bpstruct.h"
00072 #endif
00073 PACK_STRUCT_BEGIN
00074 struct ip_hdr {
00075   /* version / header length / type of service */
00076   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(u16_t _v_hl_tos);
00077   /* total length */
00078   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(u16_t _len);
00079   /* identification */
00080   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(u16_t _id);
00081   /* fragment offset field */
00082   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(u16_t _offset);
00083 #define IP_RF 0x8000        /* reserved fragment flag */
00084 #define IP_DF 0x4000        /* dont fragment flag */
00085 #define IP_MF 0x2000        /* more fragments flag */
00086 #define IP_OFFMASK 0x1fff   /* mask for fragmenting bits */
00087   /* time to live / protocol*/
00088   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(u16_t _ttl_proto);
00089   /* checksum */
00090   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(u16_t _chksum);
00091   /* source and destination IP addresses */
00092   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(struct ip_addr src);
00093   PACK_STRUCT_FIELD(struct ip_addr dest); 
00094 } PACK_STRUCT_STRUCT;
00095 PACK_STRUCT_END
00096 #ifdef PACK_STRUCT_USE_INCLUDES
00097 #  include "arch/epstruct.h"
00098 #endif
00099 
00100 #define IPH_V(hdr)  (ntohs((hdr)->_v_hl_tos) >> 12)
00101 #define IPH_HL(hdr) ((ntohs((hdr)->_v_hl_tos) >> 8) & 0x0f)
00102 #define IPH_TOS(hdr) (htons((ntohs((hdr)->_v_hl_tos) & 0xff)))
00103 #define IPH_LEN(hdr) ((hdr)->_len)
00104 #define IPH_ID(hdr) ((hdr)->_id)
00105 #define IPH_OFFSET(hdr) ((hdr)->_offset)
00106 #define IPH_TTL(hdr) (ntohs((hdr)->_ttl_proto) >> 8)
00107 #define IPH_PROTO(hdr) (ntohs((hdr)->_ttl_proto) & 0xff)
00108 #define IPH_CHKSUM(hdr) ((hdr)->_chksum)
00109 
00110 #define IPH_VHLTOS_SET(hdr, v, hl, tos) (hdr)->_v_hl_tos = (htons(((v) << 12) | ((hl) << 8) | (tos)))
00111 #define IPH_LEN_SET(hdr, len) (hdr)->_len = (len)
00112 #define IPH_ID_SET(hdr, id) (hdr)->_id = (id)
00113 #define IPH_OFFSET_SET(hdr, off) (hdr)->_offset = (off)
00114 #define IPH_TTL_SET(hdr, ttl) (hdr)->_ttl_proto = (htons(IPH_PROTO(hdr) | ((ttl) << 8)))
00115 #define IPH_PROTO_SET(hdr, proto) (hdr)->_ttl_proto = (htons((proto) | (IPH_TTL(hdr) << 8)))
00116 #define IPH_CHKSUM_SET(hdr, chksum) (hdr)->_chksum = (chksum)
00117 
00118 #if IP_DEBUG
00119 void ip_debug_print(struct pbuf *p);
00120 #endif /* IP_DEBUG */
00121 
00122 #endif /* __LWIP_IP_H__ */
